functions.name: .getDemandedEnergy()
functions.description: The maximum amount of EU that can be received

functions.name: .pushItems(toName: string, fromSlot: int, limit?: int, toSlot?: int)
functions.description: Push items from this inventory to another inventory. Returns the amount transferred.

functions.name: .suck(slot?: int, limit?: int)
functions.description: Suck an item from the ground

functions.name: .getSinkTier()
functions.description: The tier of this EU sink. 1 = LV, 2 = MV, 3 = HV, 4 = EV etc.

functions.name: .drop(slot: int, limit?: int, direction?: string)
functions.description: Drop an item on the ground. Returns the number of items dropped

functions.name: .getDocs(name?: string)
functions.description: Get the documentation for all functions or the function specified. Errors if the function cannot be found.

functions.name: .getItemMeta(slot: int)
functions.description: The metadata of the item in the specified slot. The slot number starts from 1.

functions.name: .pullItems(fromName: string, fromSlot: int, limit?: int, toSlot?: int)
functions.description: Pull items to this inventory from another inventory. Returns the amount transferred.

functions.name: .getTransferLocations(location?: string)
functions.description: Get a list of all available objects which can be transferred to or from

functions.name: .list()
functions.description: List all items in this inventory

functions.name: .getSourceTier()
functions.description: The tier of this EU source. 1 = LV, 2 = MV, 3 = HV, 4 = EV etc.

functions.name: .getItem(slot: int)
functions.description: The item in the specified slot. The slot number starts from 1.
